Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max

Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of max(-1, 17) is

Question 2.
The type of max(12, 10.00247284715525200) is

Question 3. 
max(-11, -7) ==

Question 4. 
max(10.58161165013796400, ) == 26.58161165013796400

Question 5. 
max(2, ) == 2
